title: shrI kamalAmbikayA kaTAkSitOham
sahitya:
shrI kamalAmbikayA kaTAkSitOham saccidAnanda paripUrNa brahmAsmi


anupallavi

  pAkashAsanAdi sakala dEvatA sEvitayA pankajAsanAdi panca krtya krt-bhAvitayA shOkahara 
catura padayA mUka mukhya vAkpradayA kOkanada vijaya padayA guruguha tatrai padayA


caraNam    ananga kusumAdyaSTa shaktyAkArayA aruNavarNa samkSObhaNa cakrAkArayA
ananta kOTyaNDa nAyaka shankara nAyikayA aSTa vargAtmaka gupta tarayA varayA
anangA dyupAsitayA aSTadaLAbjasthitayA dhanur bANa dhara karayA dayA sudhA sAgarayA
